snippet.title: Funko x 10:10 Games - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Funko is elated to announce our entry into console via a brand new partnership with 10:10 Games!

Led by legendary video game developer, and 5-time BAFTA award winner Jon Burton (formerly of TT Games), 10:10 Games was specifically founded for this purpose, and is already home to some of the most talented designers, and developers on the planet.

Funko and 10:10 Games have been hard at work for over a year on this exciting new initiative that will produce a wealth of AAA content on a variety of consoles and PC. Whilst we cannot reveal the title, and other third party studio partners at this time, we can reveal that the first game will be an action platformer and rated "T" for Teen.
